author: Dat
content:
Internet is not slow in Malaysia.. It's just that we are paying through the nose for internet speeds that are considered  slow in other countries.. This is what pisses me off.. 

And for the past few weeks, I can't even watch a five minute Youtube vid at 144p (not 1440p) without constant buffering.. And I'm paying RM149 for this.. You tell me, is there any reason to be satisfied with this? I've called the ISP and they say this and they say that.. Nothing has changed and I'm still waiting to see how are they gonna fixed this nonsense...
